job.title: Machine Learning Engineer V
job.description: pDescriptionppbrppThe Digital Twin amp Rich Media team in IT Foundation platform is working to define the data management strategy for Rich Media and the workflows to extract value from it All rich media data across the enterprise being generated by Drones ROVs Laser Scanners and other sources need to be properly stored organized indexed and ready to be integrated into advanced workflows including computer vision and others to enable digital twins at scaleppbrppResponsibilitiesppbrppDevelop machine learning workflows to enable an AzureFirst approach to computer vision applications Conduct POCs with different vendors in data science and machine learning spaceppGather requirements and understand common problems across the enterprise to define develop and deploy the foundational capabilities in this spaceppStreamline labeling infrastructure provisioning and training processes to speed up the development cycleppbrppRequired ExperienceppbrppSolid experience building computer vision applications using deep learning methods with static 2D Images and realtime videosppbrppSolid azure skills and ability to connect different services and products to create automated ML workflows including training modelsppbrppSolid Python skillsppbrppPrevious experience in Ansible is a plusppbrppWorking in agile teamppbrppPreferred ExperienceppbrppPrevious experience applying computer vision to drone or other unmanned system generated rich media data is preferredppbrppPrevious experience with segmentation amp classification of 3D Point Clouds will be a plusppbrppEducationppBA  BS in engineering or computer scienceppbrppInterview ProcessppVideo conferenceppp
